testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate test price of products is match with total price in my cart.
testcase.name: Validate search product page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on amazon landing page........................................passed When user search "headphone" in search box..................................passed And hit enter...............................................................passed Then user navigated to search result page...................................passed When user click on Add to carts from search result page.....................passed And user click on My cart...................................................passed Then user navigate to My cart and see list of products......................passed
